meanings.definition: A distinctive intricate pattern of curved, feather-shaped figures.
meanings.sent1: The scarf had a beautiful paisley design on it.
meanings.sent2: She wore a paisley dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The cat played with a paisley ribbon, thinking it was a colorful snake.
meanings.sent4: The paisley clouds in the sky resembled a flock of birds flying south.
meanings.sent5: The paisley pattern on the rug was so detailed, it looked like a work of art.

meanings.definition: A soft woolen fabric with a colorful pattern of curved, feather-shaped figures.
meanings.sent1: He wrapped himself in a cozy paisley blanket.
meanings.sent2: The couch was adorned with paisley cushions.
meanings.sent3: She mistook the paisley scarf for a warm, fluffy cat.
meanings.sent4: The paisley fabric felt like a gentle hug against her skin.
meanings.sent5: The paisley throw added a pop of color to the room.
